articles.content:
NASA scientists in Greenland took an unprecedented look at Cold War history when surveys found an abandoned "city under the ice."
In April, two scientists surveying the Greenland Ice Sheet found Cam… [+2984 chars]

articles.title: The High Energetic Costs Of Changing Colors In Octopus - Forbes
articles.description: Changing colors is as energetically demanding for octopuses as jogging for 23 minutes is for humans.
articles.content:
Changing colors is as energetically demanding for octopuses as jogging for 23 minutes is for humans.

articles.title: At 3 million years old, this newly discovered planet is one of the youngest, study finds - USA TODAY
articles.description: Forming an estimated 3 million years ago, the planet discovered by astronomers at the University of North Carolina is in its relative infancy.
articles.content:
A "baby" planet that astronomers recently observed some 430 light-years from Earth may be the youngest planet ever discovered.
Forming an estimated 3 million years ago, the planet may seem old to us… [+3601 chars]
